documents.document: @smrtgirl Ya. Gave me a fright haha
When it's 1030am and it's already been a hella long day 😑
Long train ride and I forgot my headphones 😭😭😭

Have an important meeting to go to, a giant headache and just spilt coffee all over my new white top.
#Winning
@Zonkos oh yeah. Juat gave me a fright haha. Apartment dwelling means you feel lots
That quake gave me a fright 😨

Is buying a coffee a day excessive?
Because we all know that it's about a quarter of your pay every time you buy one in Wellington.

It's ok. Found my chips
I ate them
Yum https://t.co/FvYOB1dGEA

Drunk is all perspective. Am I drunk? Am I perceived as drunk?
Yes. Likely shit-faced.
#LostMyChips
Spent almosr an hour trying to make glasses out of corn chips. Lots of vodka and 1 bottle of wine qill do that 🙃

At home drunk and watching videos on the "Patrick Gower for Prime Minister 2017" page
I like how much he likes the news!
You got my vote!
@lootcrate So the second one is the delayed one? Thanks, logged a job because we have been up and running for over two weeks :)
@lootcrate Hi, is the delayed shipping for the Wizarding crate for the first one? Got a tracking email saying it's in New Zealand in Dec?
@Covlin It seems to have settled on Seddon for now. I've never seen geonet switch location like that before
In non-earthquake news, I got some Burger King at 11 30 pm and am sincerely regretting it.
@mikokiko @geonet Yes please. But seriously Geonet rules!
@Covlin Geonet keeps switching the originating location from Wellington to Seddon and back, it very well could have been a Seddon quake.
@mikokiko it's Seddon again...
@mikokiko I saw that. Wtf
What a long quake...
Almost got out of my chair for that one! #eqnz
Woah shit #eqnz
This train feels oddly bumpy. And fast.
Just stopped a lady from patting a dog waiting for its human on Manners Mall. She was all over him and he was terrified! She was cluless!

Drunk text my mum happy new years. Had one spelling mistake. She texted back: "are you drunk?!"...
NoOoooOooooOoo
Really sad at the news that Carrie Fisher has passed away 😭
@addieey279 Thank you so much! I may have eaten most of the chocolate already haha. The coffee is fine so it's all good!

Kids are trying to steal ma chocolate.
Nope.
Thanks #nzsecretsanta! Absolutely nailed my fave chocolate & so excited about the Pokémon! Also, COFFEE 😍 https://t.co/zZqoWa9DaN
@addieey279 tonight with my family! It's one of two presents I have, I get nothing from my mum haha
Huge headache on Christmas day. Hoping it doesn't evolve into a migraine
@kassh Fuck yeah. Got some awesome accessories today. #treatyoself

Merry Christmas Andrea.
Best wishes,
Andrea.
Awww, I'm so nice! https://t.co/Z3W2Kjvmf6
Have had confirmation that my #nzsecretsanta has arrived. Will open it on Christmas day 😆😆
New job isn't the best. Getting an icecream to cheer me up
Rouge One was excellent! #MidnightScreening #StarWarsRogueOne #StarWars 👌😍😍😍🤗🤗🤗😆😆😆😆
Took my flatmate to see Fantastic Beasts last night and she didn't like it too much. #Muggle
@kassh life fucking sucks.
@KittyCatNZ Ah well. They pay me to turn up haha
When your new job turns out to be just as shit as the one you left 😢😢😢
Fuck that gave me a fright! Was just looking at the uni and the windows started bending haha #eqnz
@AmyDeerie raaage. Just never buying clothes again
I dislike clothes shopping. So, so much.
Felt that quake in the car. Scary
@kassh She said it was the most comfortable bed ever!
Little sister comes to visit. Somehow ends up woth my bed and I'm on the airbed in the lounge...
Lift shut on me and now I have coffee all down my white top 😣😭
@adriel Yaaas keept refreshing YHA and a private twin popped up GOT IT
@AmyDeerie Yaaas keept refreshing YHA and a private twin popped up GOT IT
@adriel I have been messed around so much trying to book. They confirm then cancel
@AmyDeerie All the smaller rooms are gone. I just cant share with 8 people to scary and shit gets stolen,
@adriel there is nothing!
Finding accommodation for Adele in Auckland in March is a fucking nightmare. Legit don't know where my mate and I will stay
Trying to watch Gilmore Girls here ok #eqnz
@FlyAirNZ on grab a seat or the normal website?
@FlyAirNZ hi! Have you put on extra flights from Wellington to Auckland and back for the March 25th Adele concert?
@wcl_library hi, do you guys sell the water containers the council used to sell?
@ReallyBoringNZ got your work email now 😎
@VinLew Yep. Made my apartment groan haha scared me!
That #eqnz scared the fucking fuck out of me. Fuuuuck.
@grantrobertson1 The cost is waaay to much.
@FarmersNZ Thanks!
The hayfever is strong today
@FarmersNZ Hello! Any update for your Cuba St store? Its all bordered up and sad looking. Are all the staff ok? Lovely people 😊
New job is going to be very responsibility and stress heavy 😂😣

Everyone in the flat is weirdly anxious. Pacing & not wanting to go to bed.
Flattie pointed out the quake was this night last week 🙃
Been rather stressed these last few days. Getting a haircut tomorrow should help me feel better haha

Just saw @FantasticBeasts and it was even more than I ever expected!
The magic is still there, and I loved it.
#Always.

Been waiting all morning for the carpet driers and glassie to turn up to fix earthquake damage
Going to get a coffee. Bet they both turn up
We can't sleep so I'm running solar night lights in the lounge for my scared flattie. She won't sleep with her door closed just yet.
Anyone know if recycling is being picked up tonight in the CBD?
That gave me a fright! And it's super long #eqnz

Really want a a real coffee. Kinda feeling pent up.
Might venture outside

I think the Mayor of Wellington made a huge mistake saying that the CBD would be open today.
Mother Nature clearly isn't done with us.

Damn this quake!
Just ordered pizza!
#eqnz

Went to the chemist (unwell, so thankful they were open) and I have never felt Wellington so still.
It was a surreal feeling
And I was starting to feel better #eqnz
@ardrigh geez. The plates must be blowing off steam
@VinLew Flee well, my friend. Send pics haha
@hamfritta An event then. Very noticible in an apartment

Are these quakes all over the place, like in different places?
They feel different each time.
#eqnz
@hamfritta my room is full of them
@hamishmca Right! I can't find my stormtroopers head
@lisalikesstuff aww thanks. We are ok just apartments are scary

My throat is on fire and I'm fucking trying to clean shit up.
I give up. Sitting in my lazy boy haha

Huge fucking cracks. Shit fucking everywhere. Strep throat.
Fuuuuck
Flats a mess. Glass everywhere. #eqnz https://t.co/NBHpSGYBes
Going to be sick on my annual leave 😠😠😠😠
@_abbey_ Off the nz fandom trading page haha. It's the Kymera wand and it's fun as!
Was woken up by a sore throat and sore ears😣😢😭😭😭

My friend tagged me in a post about a Harry Potter wand remote for TVs.
Cracked her up when I admitted I already own it 😆😂
Catching up with an old foster brother today. Should be good+
I’ve just signed up for awesomeness at #nzsecretsanta. Come play! https://t.co/7zj0RMpgna
The world is fucked. Let's live it up! #Trump2016
Off to Auckland. I forgot my headphones. Crying.
My mum just saved an 8 week old kitten from being put down and adopted her. Owners didn't want her cos she scratched their baby! Dicks!
@smrtgirl Twitter is my go too as well haha. Well, I'll try to get back to sleep 🙃
@smrtgirl deff quake. I heard it coming in wellys haha
That gave me a frigging fright 😣 #eqnz
@SparkNZ Hi. My socialiser isn't correctly my Facebook usage. Says I've used <50 mb this month. Phone clearly records it at almost 500mb?
